meanings.definition: A person in charge of a castle.
meanings.sent1: The castellans oversaw the security of the castle.
meanings.sent2: The king appointed a new castellans to manage the fortress.
meanings.sent3: The castellans decided to have a castle-wide scavenger hunt for fun.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the castle with the authority of a castellans.
meanings.sent5: The castellans stood tall on the castle walls, watching over the kingdom.

meanings.definition: The position or rank of a castellan.
meanings.sent1: His dream was to achieve the prestigious castellans within the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The castellans was highly respected among the knights and nobles.
meanings.sent3: In the play, the jester comically claimed the title of castellans.
meanings.sent4: She aspired to reach the pinnacle of castellans in the realm.
meanings.sent5: The castellans held great power and responsibility within the castle walls.
